text: Butin (masculine; ) or Butina (feminine; ) is a surname of Slavic origin that may refer to *Édouard Butin (born 1988), French football striker *Jacques Butin (born 1925), French former field hockey player *Maria Butina (born 1988), Russian foreign agent *Roy Butin (1876–1943), American recording artist *Tomislav Butina (born 1974), Croatian football goalkeeper Category:Russian- language surnames
title: Butin (surname)
